project.name: JUnitReportPrinter
project.scriptdef: importClass(javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory); importClass(java.lang.System); var docElement = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance().newDocumentBuilder().parse(attributes.get("xmlfile")).getDocumentElement(); for (var i = 0, tsArray = docElement.getElementsByTagName("testsuite"); tsArray != null && i < tsArray.getLength(); i++) { var ts = tsArray.item(i); if( (ts.getElementsByTagName("failure") != null && ts.getElementsByTagName("failure").getLength() > 0) || (ts.getElementsByTagName("error") != null && ts.getElementsByTagName("error").getLength() > 0)) { System.out.println("[TestSuite name=\"" + ts.getAttribute("name") + "\", failures=\"" + ts.getAttribute("failures") + "\", errors=\"" + ts.getAttribute("errors") + "\"]"); for (var j = 0, cases = ts.getElementsByTagName("testcase"); cases != null && j < cases.getLength(); j++) { var testCase = cases.item(j); for (var k = 0, failures = testCase.getElementsByTagName("failure"); failures != null && k < failures.getLength(); k++) { System.err.println(" " + testCase.getAttribute("name") + ": " + failures.item(k).getAttribute("message")); //System.err.println(" " + testCase.getAttribute("name") + ": " + failures.item(k).getChildNodes().item(0).getNodeValue()); } for (var k = 0, errors = testCase.getElementsByTagName("error"); errors != null && k < errors.getLength(); k++) { System.err.println(" " + testCase.getAttribute("name") + ": " + errors.item(k).getAttribute("message")); //System.err.println(" " + testCase.getAttribute("name") + ": " + errors.item(k).getChildNodes().item(0).getNodeValue()); } } } }
